text:
It would be hugely helpful if the documentation and/or README included a brief section on packages that provide OAuth support using `oauthlib`.

For example, at the moment there's no easy way of finding which, if any, Django packages or Flask packages provide OAuth support using this library.  Linking to [django-oauth-toolkit](https://django-oauth-toolkit.readthedocs.org/en/latest/index.html)  and [flask-oauthlib](https://github.com/lepture/flask-oauthlib), and any other similar packages would be _really_ helpful.
title: Document packages using `oauthlib`.

text: Could not agree more. Feel free to add a section where you think it would be best.
Great. Will add something in due course.
